abstract: In the roughly three weeks after their appointments, 10 members of the bipartisan deficit panel received a total of about $83,000 for their campaign and leadership committees.
snippet: In the roughly three weeks after their appointments, 10 members of the bipartisan deficit panel received a total of about $83,000 for their campaign and leadership committees.

headline.main: Donors Gave $83,000 to Deficit Panel Members in August
